name: Bryce
story:
Good evening, Bryce. Welcome to the most terrifying night of your life.

You are trapped in a house with a ruthless killer and 2 other innocent players. Search for the key and escape the house before you're murdered.

        Pay attention to any clues about the identity of the killer. When someone is killed, you will have the chance to speak with the other players and vote to banish one person. Banish the killer or escape the house and you win.

Turn #1
        Location: Hallway
        Other Players in Hallway: You are alone.
        Your Action: Go to the Bedroom

Regan was killed! Now the group will have a discussion about who they think the killer is. What would you like to say?
Bryce: "I wish I knew"
Tim: "I'm sorry, I couldn't see what was going on in the bedroom"
Bob: "I was in the living room during the murder. I didn't see anything either."

Here are the votes:
Bryce voted to banish Bryce
Tim voted to banish Tim
Bob voted to banish Bryce
Bryce was banished from the house!


You were banished from the house. You lose.

name: Bob
story:
Good evening, Bob. Welcome to the most terrifying night of your life.

You are the killer. There are 3 other players trapped in this house with you. They are looking for a key to escape the house. You must kill them all before they escape. 

        Be careful to avoid suspicion. If someone sees you commit murder in the same room as them, they will tell the other players, and the group will vote to banish you. Tonight, deception is your friend.

Turn #1
        Location: Kitchen
        Other Players in Kitchen: Regan
        Your Action: Kill Regan

You killed Regan! Good job. You have 2 left to kill.

Regan was killed! Now the group will have a discussion about who they think the killer is. What would you like to say?
Bryce: "I wish I knew"
Tim: "I'm sorry, I couldn't see what was going on in the bedroom"
Bob: "I was in the living room during the murder. I didn't see anything either."

Here are the votes:
Bryce voted to banish Bryce
Tim voted to banish Tim
Bob voted to banish Bryce
Bryce was banished from the house!
